Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that the Nigerian military is attacking ESN members in Orlu, without providing sufficient evidence or proof of such an attack.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only provides a photo and a caption from a Facebook account known for promoting the activities of a separatist movement, without any additional credible sources or evidence.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image of a helicopter posted by a Facebook account is evidence of the Nigerian military attacking ESN members in Orlu, without verifying the authenticity of the claim or the source of the image.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image being circulated as part of the military operation in Orlu was actually taken near the capital Abuja three years ago, during a different military demonstration.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the image, as it was originally published in a Nigerian daily newspaper in 2018, depicting military airstrikes against Boko Haram, not the Nigerian military attacking ESN members in Orlu.
